Name: sin-naseemismailand-lad
Author: Naseem Ismail And Masoor Maulana, Kaleel

Translations.Text: husma hira vena taramaṭa adhika vēgayen duvana aśvayin matada
(duvana vēgayenma kura gæṭennaṭa salasvā) gini pupuru vīsi vannaṭa salasvana dæya matada
tavada udē pāndara (saturan kerehi) pæna duvana dæya matada
(esē vēgayen duvana viṭa, valākuḷu men) emagin dūvili avussā damana dæya matada
pasuva (saturangē sēnāva) madhyayehi ē hētuven atuḷu vana dæya matada sattakinma
niyata vaśayenma minisā tama deviyanṭa keḷehiguṇa nodakvanneku vaśayen siṭinnēya
niyata vaśayenma ohuma meyaṭa sākṣi vaśayenda siṭinnēya
niyata vaśayenma ohu itāmat dæḍi vaśayenma vastuvaṭa ādaraya karannēya
sohon (kabru) vala æti dæya piṭataṭa vīsi karanu læba
sithi æti dæya eḷidarav karanu labana avasthāvēdī
niyata vaśayenma (minisun vana) ovungē deviyan (napuru aya kavarekda? hon̆da aya kavarekda?yi) ovunva edinadī hon̆din dæna gannēya yanuven ohu dæna gattē nædda
